sense.def:
To introduce one person to another
pomeni dvema osebama povedati, kako je drugi ime, da se lahko spoznata.

seg.quote: At a party in Hollywood, I was introduced to Charlie Chaplin.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
introduces a television or radio programme
, poslušalcem ali gledalcem na začetku oddaje pove, o čem bo govorila.

To introduce something to a place or system
pomeni nekaj prvič vzeti ali nekje uporabiti.

seg.quote: Rabbits had been introduced into Australia by Europeans.
Banks will soon introduce new savings plans.

sense.def:
To introduce someone to something
pomeni povzročiti, da nekdo prvič nekaj doživi.

seg.quote: We introduced them to the new methods.
He was first introduced to politics as a child.
